The researcher is the severity of what is between the angels who are close to them, peace be upon them, and they return to his opinion.Then a place for the distance is a place, and it is to be a custody of what he accepted, and he was made a sign to: when the throne and what is meant by being a deduction is there as a lot of it The approaches, as you heard and begged to be a custody of what after it, means his saying of his chance: a mother and the indication of it, and his safety is on the one.And in a narration from him, peace be upon him, he said: “I believed that I did not pass anything, so I returned it to others.” Because of his aspirations, peace be upon him, he enters the veils, as some of the antiquities, without then.Abu Jaafar, Abu Hayyah, and Abu Al -Barahim and Ibn Muqasim read: “Then” by adding the rituals a letter of great kindness to the honesty and the two people because it is better.And the owner of the reforms said: It is in the sense of waw; Because Gabriel, peace be upon him, was with the two rows with one case, and if he went to go to repentance and humiliation in this kindness in the sense of the one who is in the sense of the highest, in the sense of the highest, in the sense His separation from them is a state of life to the prophets, peace be upon them, and he would have responded to him.I finish.And what is dependent on him is what you heard, and the place requires the greatest safety; Because the payment of the Qur’an is a deficiency of the honesty of the Messenger.
